Description: Discount rate applied to yearly cash flows
List of users included in the simulation
Time resolution of the simulation. When a string is provided, the time resolution profile is loaded from the optional_datasets; alternatively, a float or list of floats can be provided directly
Weight of each time step over the year
Column containing the reward value for shared energy
Peak-category label for each time step
List of datasets from where to load the profile quantities when string entries values are provided
